Joomladay Italy & Nooku Demo Day

02 November 2009 by Johan

The Nooku Team will be at the Joomladay Italy on November 21st in Rome to talk about DOCman 1.5 and it’s future. But we have much more to talk about: Together with Beyounic, we are organizing a Nooku Demo Day in Rome on November 20th. The event will be mainly focussed on the [Nooku Framework][1].

25 September 2009 by Johan

The first Nooku Demo Day last March was a fun gettogether. We got one complaint however: apparently all Joomla events in The Netherlands are in the South of the country. 26 August 2009 by Johan

Nooku Framework goes Sourceforge

21 August 2009 by Johan

The Nooku team is delighted to announce that the Nooku Framework has been publicly released — made available at Sourceforge.net

The framework – which was announced last May -  empowers Joomla! 1.5 to new levels and is designed to provide third-party developers with Joomla’s missing MVC.
